name: WheelEvent.deltaX
description: The WheelEvent.deltaX read-only property is a double representing the horizontal scroll amount in the WheelEvent.deltaMode unit.

refs.name: Document Object Model (DOM) Level 3 Events Specification
refs.description: The definition of 'WheelEvent.deltaX' in the 'Document Object Model (DOM) Level 3 Events Specification' specification.
